settings.item_text: Sign up to join Palmers Rewards now so you can start growing your rewards!

settings.item_title: I’ve made a palmers purchase in-store but don’t have an account
settings.item_text: Sign up now and enter the 12 digit code on your receipt to earn points towards your first reward!

settings.item_title: I have a Palmers Rewards card but haven’t activated it online
settings.item_text: Register your card online now using the X digit number on the back of your card

settings.accordion_title: I’ve recently made a purchase instore, how can I keep those points?
settings.accordion_content: Register your account using the code found at the bottom of your reciept to start earning points towards your rewards!

settings.accordion_title: Where can I find the code on my reciept?
settings.accordion_content: Register your account using the code found at the bottom of your reciept to start earning points towards your rewards!

settings.accordion_title: I already have a Palmers rewards card, how do I link my online account?
settings.accordion_content: Register your account using the code found at the bottom of your reciept to start earning points towards your rewards!
